column1: Little Goat Diner////There were quite a few times when I asked Caroline for another napkin
column2: she pointed me to a napkin holder of small
column3: square napkins rather than providing a replacement for my lap. We had to ask Caroline for a refill for our water carafe and later a refill for my iced tea
column4: which would have been a beer had Caroline informed they had alcohol when I asked what beverages were offered. Caroline told me the types of fountain sodas only. To my surprise
column6: wine and even milkshakes being served.
